remarks: The supremum function distributes over addition in a sense similar to that in ~ supmul .  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 26-Sep-2017.)
statement:
supadd.a1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
supadd.a2 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
supadd.a3 $e |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR A. y e. A y <_ x ) $.
supadd.b1 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ RR ) $.
supadd.b2 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= (/) ) $.
supadd.b3 $e |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR A. y e. B y <_ x ) $.
supadd.c $e |- C = { z | E. v e. A E. b e. B z = ( v + b ) } $.
supadd $p |- ( ph -> ( sup ( A , RR , < ) + sup ( B , RR , < ) ) = sup ( C , RR , < ) ) $.
$d A b v x y z $.
$d B b v x y z $.
$d C x $.
$d b ph v z $.
